title: ICT-Enhanced Preservice Language Teacher Education Module: Focused on Reflective Practice and Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language pedagogy knowledge and digital device utilization experience
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation environment replicating actual classroom scenarios for practical training, with learning outcomes reinforced through reflective journaling and collaborative feedback

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement language instruction scenarios utilizing ICT tools in a VR simulation environment at least twice.
Learners can evaluate and improve their instructional design process through reflective practice (journaling, peer feedback).
Learners can derive at least three ICT application strategies applicable in the mathematics education domain.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
